question: What are the hiring trends in technology sectors among companies in the last year?

subtasks.task: Identify the technology sectors of interest by querying the CompanyHiringDetail table to extract technology-related job postings from the last year.
Aggregate hiring data from the CompanyHiringDetail table by counting the number of job postings per technology sector per company for the last year to understand trends.
Cross-reference the aggregated hiring data with the CompanyInfo table to identify companies by industry and revenue size to see how hiring trends vary by company profile.
Analyze the results to determine which technology sectors have seen the highest growth in hiring and prepare a summary of the findings.
